snippet.title: Ashes TC: Dead Man Walking DLC
snippet.description:
Okay, so this isn't something of mine, but I had to share this. Zdoom modder ReformedJoe (of Interstellar Enforcer) has been working on an AMAZING mini-episode for Ashes Episode One. Apart from being a far better mapper than I am, he's also added an extra town, some crazy battles and some more wasteland weirdness, set within the growing Ashes universe.

Includes an extra custom soundtrack!

https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=19&t=62707

To run this mod, you'll need the 1.15 version of the Ashes 2063 maps and mod. You can get them here:
https://www.mediafire.com/file/ya00h8wafnipsze/AshesRelease1_15.zip/file

You'll also need the current version of the DMW DLC. It, and information on Dead Man Walking, can be found here:
https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=19&t=62707

Simply extract both files to your Gzdoom folder, and run Gzdoom from a shortcut, adding this to the shortcut's target:

"-file Ashes2063maps.wad   -file ashes2063mod.pk3 -file RJAshesDMW.pk3" (without quotes)

Information on the Ashes 2063 TC for Doom 2 can be found here:
https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=19&t=47573

It goes without saying that you'll need the newest version of GZDOOM and either the Doom2.wad or a copy of Freedoom2's wad to run this.

Now, I hope you have as much fun playing this as I did.
